original_text: If you do not do this, you may not have enough money. You may put the first stones in the ground, but then you cannot finish the building. If you have to stop, other people will laugh at you. They will say to each other,
korean_text: 그렇게 아니하여 그 기초만 쌓고 능히 이루지 못하면 보는 자가 다 비웃어

sentences.original_text: If you do not do this
you may not have enough money
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 충분한 돈이 없을 수도 있습니다

sentences.original_text: You may put the first stones in the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 첫 돌들을 땅에 놓을 수도 있지만

sentences.original_text: but then you cannot finish the building
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 당신은 건물을 완성할 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: other people will laugh at you
They will say to each other
